entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning early this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
